thread.section_title: Compare Broadband Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Compare Broadband | comparebroadband.com.au
thread.title: Chris Jasprizza
thread.title_full: Compare Broadband reviewed by Chris Jasprizza

author: Chris Jasprizza
title: Chris Jasprizza
text:
I was on the phone for about 5 minutes.
I had a deal sorted by the end of the call with no lock in contract and no connection/setup fees.
I was told it will take 2-7 days for the service to be activated. (Telstra had been saying 14-21 business days just to process the order and send us a confirmation email)
The only payment required at this stage has been $60.00 to buy a modem.
Can't fault the service.
